name: Internet of Things
body:
### Welcome to Sashi Penta's home page of Internet of Things

Here are some projects related to Internet of things.

### Project 1 : Take break

This program turns on LED when one works continuously more than certain amount of time. LED indicating the developer to take breaks.

### Project 2 : Communication between Android and Arduino

A version of Android and Arduino programs. Idea is to have communication between these two. Still workin in progress.

### Author
Sashi Penta
Github username: sashipenta
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
